{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=EX6100 |revision=v2 |asin=B00HHRP11C |fcc_date=08/30/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=range extender |fcc_id=PY316100333 |ic_id=4054A-16100333 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.16 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018 |cpu1_cspeed=717 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W632GU6KB-12 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN/BT FEM;Skyworks;SKY85303-11;SKY11, 85303, 550JL;2; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85717;SKY21, 85717, 508WA;1; |flags=DFS (master), DFS (slave), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''433Mbps''' - 1SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''750 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC750 WiFi Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-range-extenders/EX6100.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=EX6100v2}} "2976528502" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The hardware design is identical to the [[Netgear EX6150v2]] which is AC1200. One of the 5GHz front-end modules is missing in the FCC photos so 802.11ac from the IPQ4018 is probably limited to single-stream speeds in this EX6100v2. The 5GHz FEM, FLA1, and switch IDs are taken from the EX6150v2 FCC images and assumed to be the same. DFS was added in a Class II Permissive Change on 10/17/2017 Web GUI: http://www.mywifiext.net
